devdoc.author: Adam Scott Price

killCircuitBreaker().details: called from the Pausable contract only callable by owner, only callable when paused()

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

payHash(string).details: address cant be null and passed has length must be greater than 0.

params._hash: The IPFS has where the file is stored in the inter planetary file system

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

uploadFile(string,string,uint256,string).details: hashaddress is mapped to hashaddress, filecount in incremented and sender address stored, event is also triggered

params._amount: The amount you want to withdraw

devdoc.title: A storage contract that you can pay IPFS hash's ether

hitCircuitBreaker().notice: stops interaction with the contract only contract admin can use this function

payHash(string).notice: pays a stored IPFS hash a set amount of ether

uploadFile(string,string,uint256,string).notice: uploads a file to IPFS and stores information

withdraw(uint256).notice: withdraws funds you have stored against your address

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to upload files to IPFS system and send uploader a thankyou in the form of ether!!
